title: Kakuchou Shoujo-kei Trinary
original_name: 拡張少女系トライナリー
opening_song: "Tech Tra! -Yumemille feuille guruRemiX.- (テクトラ！-Yumemille feuille guruRemiX.-)" by Trinary
ending_song: "The Truly Lovely Show !!" by Trinary (Mariko Takeda, Mitsuki Nakae, Yuki Yagi, Ami Hagihara, Emi Hirayama)
sinopse:
The story centers on five girls who fight with a special mission in the plane of existence on the other side of the screen. The setting of the story is the metropolitan area of the Japanese capital, after it was beset by a certain abnormality.

(Source: ANN)
